user_query: I want to surprise my colleagues with interesting facts during our next team meeting. Can you provide me with a random trivia fact? Additionally, fetch a game level from the Music Trivia tool to engage everyone. Lastly, share a chuck joke to add some humor to the meeting.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random trivia fact to share with colleagues.
Retrieve a game level from the Music Trivia tool for engagement.
Get a chuck joke to add humor to the meeting.
